title: Hinduism, cyclical nature of death and rebirth

content.question: The Creator whose face is everywhere; Death that devours all things; The source of all things to come The god Krishna speaks, Bhagavad Gita, Vedic sacred text, circa fifth century to second century B.C.E. The excerpt above best represents which aspect of Hinduism?

choices.label: The desire to escape worldly suffering
The cyclical nature of death and rebirth

content.answer: The cyclical nature of death and rebirth
